sqlMap.select: select bi.*, b.btitle from tbbimg bi, tbbrand b where bi.bid = b.bid and bi.biid = #id#
select btitle, bi.* from tbbimg bi, tbbrand b where b.bid = bi.bid limit #start#, #num#
select btitle, bi.* from tbbimg bi, tbbrand b where b.bid = bi.bid and bi.bid = #bid# limit #start#, #num#
select if(isnull(count(1)), 0 , count(1)) from tbbimg bi, tbbrand b where b.bid = bi.bid
sqlMap.update: update tbbimg set biid=biid bid=#bid# iuri=#iuri# where biid=#biid#
